|castingnoise=2 |spellnoise=0 }} {{flavour|This spell temporarily coats any weapon or launcher with poison. It will only work on weapons without an existing enchantment.}} '''Poison Weapon''' was a level 3 [[Charms]]/[[Poison Magic]] spell which temporarily assigned the [[venom]] brand to the unbranded, non-[[artifact]] weapon you are currently wielding. This gives it a 75% chance per strike of [[poison]]ing the target. Multiple strikes will increase the effect, so this spell works best when cast on light, fast weapons. Unwielding the weapon will cause the brand to be lost. [[The Shining One]] does not approve of his followers using poisoned weapons. ==History== Poison Weapon was removed in [[0.15]] Prior to [[0.9]], Poison Weapon would not affect blunt weapons.
